name: Pathfinder Bancorp, Inc.
description: Pathfinder Bancorp, Inc. is a financial holding company headquartered in Oswego, New York. Established in 1999, the company serves as the parent organization for Pathfinder Bank, which has been a vital part of the community since its founding in 1859. Pathfinder Bancorp is committed to providing a wide range of financial services, including personal banking, commercial banking, and wealth management services. It emphasizes customer service and community involvement, aiming to support local businesses and foster economic development. The bank offers various deposit accounts, loans, and investment products designed to meet the financial needs of individuals and businesses alike. Pathfinder Bank operates several branches across Central New York, actively engaging in community outreach and financial literacy programs. The company strives to maintain a robust financial position while offering competitive rates and personalized service, making it a trusted partner for its customers. As it looks to the future, Pathfinder Bancorp is focused on leveraging technology to enhance banking services and improve customer experience while remaining dedicated to its core values of integrity, service, and community involvement.

seo.meta_title: Pathfinder Bancorp, Inc. | Community Banking & Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Pathfinder Bancorp, Inc. offers a range of banking and financial services in Central New York, focusing on personal and commercial banking, as well as wealth management.

faq.question: What services does Pathfinder Bancorp provide?
faq.answer: Pathfinder Bancorp provides personal banking, commercial banking, and wealth management services.

faq.question: Where is Pathfinder Bancorp headquartered?
faq.answer: Pathfinder Bancorp is headquartered in Oswego, New York, USA.

faq.question: What types of accounts can I open with Pathfinder Bank?
faq.answer: You can open checking accounts, savings accounts, and various loan products.
